name: Product Prioritization Frameworks - Notion template
description: Looking to use product prioritization frameworks to level up your product development. Use this simple & easy to use Notion template to start prioritizing like a pro today! Prioritize smarter and achieve better results with frameworks that helps you align your team, maximize ROI, and improve decision-making. What will you get?A template that:calculates the RICE score of your product/feature.calculates the ICE score of your product/feature.calculates the Cost of Delay of your product/feature.
features: calculates theRICE scoreof your product/feature.; calculates theICE scoreof your product/feature.; calculates theCost of Delayof your product/feature.; helps you categorize your features in different categories using theMoSCoWframework.
